articles.title: Ben Wagner
articles.description: Hi, welcome to my adventures in R!
articles.contents:
About Me:
I am a student at Macalester College who is passionate about all things Data Science. I have about 3 years worth of experience in R, of which I used to create this website you’re on right now! I am also familiar with Python, and have dabbled in using Tableau.
I am currently on the Men’s Soccer team here at Macalester as you can see from my headshot above. I have played many different sports including Basketball, Tennis and Hockey. I get very excited combining my love for sports and data analytics!
Education:
Orchard Park High School Class of 2018
Macalester College ’22 B.A. Economics Minor in Data Science
